content.question: Which of the following best explains the factor that prompted United States involvement in military actions during the Second World War?

choices.label: Germany attempted to convince the Mexican government to attack the United States
Japan conducted a surprise attack on a United States military base
Germany declared war against the United States
The Japanese navy carried out strikes against United States shipping interests

content.answer: Japan conducted a surprise attack on a United States military base

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
